enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve initializing or modifying the comparatorChain and orderingBits.
Both methods modify the comparatorChain and orderingBits, though setComparator operates on a specific index.
The compare method relies on the comparatorChain and orderingBits set by addComparator, making it a direct behavioral reference.
The equals method checks the state of comparatorChain and orderingBits, which are modified by addComparator.
